name: Dash and Fire
description:
if you want to improve combat effectiveness, how can you get good equipment

1. You must participate in the level unlocking activities and arena, and you can exchange the shell coins for the equipment in the store

2. Many pieces of advanced equipment will be piled up in the process of the game. If you click it in the backpack interface, you can enter the falling level. After a certain quantity is collected, the equipment will be automatically generated.
developers: Beijing AmazGame Age Internet Technology Co
